skeletonhorsespawn-fabric.duskconfig.DES: The chance a skeleton that has spawned on the surface is riding a horse.
If enabled, burns skeleton horses when daylight shines upon them.
skeletonhorsespawn-fabric.duskconfig.sho: Should Burn Skeleton Horses In Daylight
skeletonhorsespawn-fabric.duskconfig.DES: If enabled, a skeleton horse with rider will only spawn on the surface.
skeletonhorsespawn-fabric.duskconfig.onl: Only Spawn Skeleton Horses On Surface
